dict.acceptation: 成功，成就；好成绩，好结果；成功的人（或物）；

sent.orig: Your success is Tasmania's success, is Australia's success and is the world's.
sent.trans: 您的成功是塔州的成功、是澳洲的成功、也是世界的成功。

sent.orig: The success of such a movement depends on the success of our day-to-day work.
sent.trans: 群众运动搞得好不好，也是要看我们经常的工作基础搞得好不好。

sent.orig: In fact, the image of a stepping stone to success is your success.
sent.trans: 实际上，形象是你成功的敲门砖。

sent.orig: Success can be as small nuances, just reached the target set can be considered a success.
sent.trans: 成功可以小到细微之处，仅仅是达到了定下的目标，也算一种成功。

sent.orig: It is prudent to for success, for moderate success as well as for failure.
sent.trans: “为了达到目的我们很谨慎，因为我们知道，只成功一半等于失败”。
